name: CFM Transformice Themed
description: A simple restyled look for CFM.  I was bored and grew a little tired of the default look of the forums, and figured I would play with Stylish, so here it is :p  There may be a few things left untouched, and somethings might be a bit buggy.  I really wasn't able to check it across many different browsers since I am a linux user.  If you find a bug, screenshot and send it to Redditguy on the CFM forums.
obsoletion_message: Removing from public for the time being...
additional_info:
Credit:

Melibellule is the artist of the background (artist for Transformice), but you should all know that.

Update 12/17/12 - Changed the membercard links to white per request.  Guess that purple could be a bit hard to see.
